original_text:
Michelangelo
Michelangelo è alimentato da High5 Games ed è un 5 reel, 99 slot a pagamento. Basato sull’artista di fama mondiale, utilizza la funzione Tumbling Reels che si trova in alcune slot IGT e che permette di avere vittorie consecutive ad ogni giro. C’è una funzione Bonus Giochi Gratis dove si possono ottenere fino a 4 giri gratuiti, ma le Rocchetti e le Linee Collegate possono davvero aumentare le vostre vincite.
 
Una grafica artistica
Fate un viaggio di ritorno nell’Italia del Rinascimento a Michelangelo, una video slot a 5 rulli e 99 payline di High5 Games. Basato sulle opere di uno dei più grandi artisti del mondo, è dotato di bobine di Tumbling Reels, wilds e un servizio di giri gratis. Gioca da 0,99€ a €198 per giro.
I rulli di Michelangelo includono un trio delle più famose sculture dell’artista, tra cui un’interpretazione del David che è il più grande simbolo standard a pagamento. Trova 5 David e un jackpot di 1.000 monete sarà tuo. Oltre alle sculture e ai simboli standard delle carte da gioco, c’è anche il simbolo M, che paga 5.000 volte la tua linea di scommessa se colpisci una combinazione di cinque simboli.
Se sei il tipo di persona a cui piace un servizio di contorno della cultura con le tue slot online, allora forse abbiamo proprio quello che fa per te; Michelangelo è un gioco dedicato al grande scultore, pittore, architetto e uno dei più grandi artisti di tutti i tempi del XV secolo. Sicuramente non si tratta delle Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. Questo slot IGT è dotato di Tumbling Reels e giri gratis, quindi giocate ora o leggete la recensione qui sotto per maggiori informazioni.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Michelangelo beneficia di Tumbling Reels che si trova in IGT’s Da Vinci Diamonds. Dopo ogni trottola di successo, i simboli vincenti verranno cancellati e sostituiti dai simboli direttamente soprastanti. Si farà un altro calcolo. Le bobine di Tumbling Reels continuano finché c’è una combinazione vincente sulle bobine. Non c’è limite al numero di giri delle bobine. Se si fa un rotolo qui, i crediti potranno presto essere accumulati.
Trovate 3 simboli dei Giochi Gratis sui rulli 1, 2 e 3 e attiverete la funzione Bonus Giochi Gratis e sarete premiati con 1-4 giri gratuiti. Se più di 1 linea di pagamento attiva i giri gratuiti, il totale verrà totalizzato insieme, in modo che sia più che possibile colpire più di 4 giochi gratuiti.
I giochi gratis non hanno 1 ma 2 simboli jolly. Il rosso appare sui rulli 1, 2 e 3 e il rosa sui rulli 2, 3 e 4. Le bobine di rotolamento si giocano anche nei giri liberi.
Considerando il materiale di partenza, le immagini in mostra in Michelangelo sono un po’ sottotono. Sono perfettamente accettabili, ma mancano del fattore wow. Le caratteristiche sono buone, però – combinare i giri liberi, i double wilds e le bobine di burattatura e le vittorie possono essere molto veloci.
Michelangelo è una slot a cinque rulli con tre file e fino a novantanove linee di pagamento; il design dell’IGT è tipicamente basilare ma tutto è chiaro e c’è una preponderanza di bordi d’oro a praticamente tutto.
Ci sono quattro simboli di alto valore tra cui una grande ‘M’ verde e tre sculture – David, Mosè e la Venere di Milo; Q, K e A costituiscono i valori più bassi. Il simbolo wild è un ‘Wild’ viola su sfondo dorato, mentre il bonus è un’icona ‘Free Games’ che appare solo sulle bobine uno, due e tre.
Sempre una delle nostre caratteristiche preferite, il Tumbling Reels è conosciuto anche come Cascading Reels in altri giochi. Ogni volta che si ottiene una combinazione vincente, i simboli coinvolti spariscono e gli spazi creati vengono riempiti da altri simboli che cadono dall’alto. Se poi si effettua un’altra combinazione, la stessa cosa succede di nuovo e questa sequenza continua fino a quando non si formano più vittorie.
Questo si innesca facendo atterrare tre dei simboli bonus dei Giochi Liberi su bobine uno, due e tre su una linea di pagamento attiva. Lei riceverà da una a quattro rotazioni, ma se i Suoi simboli di attivazione si verificano su più di una linea di pagamento, riceverà più rotazioni. Durante questo giro il wild originale appare sulle bobine due, tre e quattro ma c’è anche un nuovo wild (su sfondo rosso) che appare sulle bobine uno, due e tre.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Se hai amato questa Slot Machine a tema artistico, possiamo suggerirti altro di molto simile. IGT e High5 Games hanno prodotto insieme alcune slot come Cats e Da Vinci Diamonds. Queste sono le alternative che ti proponiamo se vuoi continuare a scommettere su Slot simili a Michelangelo.

raw_translation.response:
Michelangelo
Michelangelo, powered by High5 Games, is a 5-reel, 99-payline slot game. Based on the world-renowned artist, it uses the Tumbling Reels feature found in some IGT slots, allowing for consecutive wins on each spin. There is a Bonus Free Games feature where you can get up to 4 free spins, but the Connected Lines and Cascading Reels features can really increase your winnings.

Artistic Graphics
Take a journey back to Renaissance Italy in Michelangelo, a 5-reel, 99-payline video slot game by High5 Games. Based on the works of one of the greatest artists in the world, it features Tumbling Reels, wilds and a free spins feature. Play from €0.99 to €198 per spin.

The reels in Michelangelo include a trio of the artist's most famous sculptures, including an interpretation of David which is the largest standard paying symbol. Find 5 Davids and a jackpot of 1,000 coins will be yours. In addition to the sculptures and standard playing card symbols, there is also the M symbol, which pays out 5,000 times your bet line when you hit a combination of five symbols.

If you're the kind of person who likes a bit of culture with your online slots, then maybe we have just the thing for you; Michelangelo is a game dedicated to the great sculptor, painter, architect, and one of the greatest artists of the XV century. This IGT slot features Tumbling Reels and free spins, so play now or read on for more information.

Features and Symbols of the Slot Machine
Michelangelo benefits from Tumbling Reels, which is found in IGT's Da Vinci Diamonds. After each successful spin, winning symbols will be removed and replaced with symbols directly above them. Another calculation is made. The Tumbling Reels continue as long as there is a winning combination on the reels. There is no limit to the number of reel spins. If you roll here, credits can soon be accumulated.

Find 3 Free Games symbols on reels 1, 2, and 3 and you will activate the Bonus Free Games feature and be awarded 1-4 free spins. If more than 1 active payline triggers free spins, the total will be added together, so it is more than possible to hit more than 4 free games.

The free games have not 1 but 2 wild symbols. The red one appears on reels 1, 2 and 3, and the pink one on reels 2, 3 and 4. The tumbling reels are also played in the free spins.

Considering the starting material, the images on display in Michelangelo are a bit underwhelming. They are perfectly acceptable, but lack the wow factor. The features, however, are good - combining free spins, double wilds, and cascading reels, and wins can be very swift.

Michelangelo is a five-reel slot with three rows and up to ninety-nine paylines; the IGT design is typically basic but everything is clear and there is a preponderance of gold borders on just about everything.

There are four high-value symbols including a large green ‘M’ and three sculptures - David, Moses, and the Venus de Milo; Q, K, and A make up the lower values. The wild symbol is a purple ‘Wild’ on a golden background, while the bonus is a ‘Free Games’ icon that appears only on reels one, two, and three.

Always one of our favourite features, Tumbling Reels is also known as Cascading Reels in other games. Whenever you get a winning combination, the involved symbols disappear and the spaces created are filled with other symbols that fall from above. If then another combination is made, the same thing happens again and this sequence continues until no more wins are formed.

This is triggered by landing three of the bonus Free Games symbols on reels one, two, and three on an active payline. You will receive one to four spins, but if your triggering symbols occur on more than one payline, you will receive more spins. During this spin, the original wild appears on reels two, three, and four, but there is also a new wild (on a red background) that appears on reels one, two, and three.

Similar Slot Machines
If you loved this artistic-themed Slot Machine, we can suggest something very similar. IGT and High5 Games have produced some slots together such as Cats and Da Vinci Diamonds. These are the alternatives we propose if you want to continue betting on slots similar to Michelangelo.

faq.question: What is the Bonus Free Games feature?
faq.answer: The Bonus Free Games feature is where you can get up to 4 free spins if you land 3 Free Games symbols on reels 1, 2, and 3.

faq.question: What happens during the free spins feature?
faq.answer: During the free spins feature, there are 2 wild symbols. The red wild appears on reels 1, 2 and 3, and the pink one on reels 2, 3, and 4. The tumbling reels are also played during free spins.

faq.question: What is the Tumbling Reels feature?
faq.answer: The Tumbling Reels feature allows for consecutive wins on each spin. Winning symbols will be removed and replaced with symbols directly above them. The Tumbling Reels continue as long as there is a winning combination on the reels.

faq.question: What is the Free Games symbol?
faq.answer: The Free Games symbol is the bonus symbol that appears only on reels 1, 2, and 3. It triggers the Bonus Free Games feature.

faq.question: Which other slot games are similar to Michelangelo?
faq.answer: Other similar slot games include Cats and Da Vinci Diamonds, also developed by High5 Games and IGT.

Review: Michelangelo
Michelangelo, powered by High5 Games, is a 5-reel, 99-payline slot game. Based on the world-renowned artist, it uses the Tumbling Reels feature found in some IGT slots, allowing for consecutive wins on each spin. There is a Bonus Free Games feature where you can get up to 4 free spins, but the Connected Lines and Cascading Reels features can really increase your winnings.

Artistic Graphics
Take a journey back to Renaissance Italy in Michelangelo, a 5-reel, 99-payline video slot game by High5 Games. Based on the works of one of the greatest artists in the world, it features Tumbling Reels, wilds and a free spins feature. Play from €0.99 to €198 per spin.

The reels in Michelangelo include a trio of the artist's most famous sculptures, including an interpretation of David which is the largest standard paying symbol. Find 5 Davids and a jackpot of 1,000 coins will be yours. In addition to the sculptures and standard playing card symbols, there is also the M symbol, which pays out 5,000 times your bet line when you hit a combination of five symbols.

If you're the kind of person who likes a bit of culture with your online slots, then maybe we have just the thing for you; Michelangelo is a game dedicated to the great sculptor, painter, architect, and one of the greatest artists of the XV century. This IGT slot features Tumbling Reels and free spins, so play now or read on for more information.

Features and Symbols of the Slot Machine
Michelangelo benefits from Tumbling Reels, which is found in IGT's Da Vinci Diamonds. After each successful spin, winning symbols will be removed and replaced with symbols directly above them. Another calculation is made. The Tumbling Reels continue as long as there is a winning combination on the reels. There is no limit to the number of reel spins. If you roll here, credits can soon be accumulated.

Find 3 Free Games symbols on reels 1, 2, and 3 and you will activate the Bonus Free Games feature and be awarded 1-4 free spins. If more than 1 active payline triggers free spins, the total will be added together, so it is more than possible to hit more than 4 free games.

The free games have not 1 but 2 wild symbols. The red one appears on reels 1, 2 and 3, and the pink one on reels 2, 3 and 4. The tumbling reels are also played in the free spins.

Considering the starting material, the images on display in Michelangelo are a bit underwhelming. They are perfectly acceptable, but lack the wow factor. The features, however, are good - combining free spins, double wilds, and cascading reels, and wins can be very swift.

Michelangelo is a five-reel slot with three rows and up to ninety-nine paylines; the IGT design is typically basic but everything is clear and there is a preponderance of gold borders on just about everything.

There are four high-value symbols including a large green ‘M’ and three sculptures - David, Moses, and the Venus de Milo; Q, K, and A make up the lower values. The wild symbol is a purple ‘Wild’ on a golden background, while the bonus is a ‘Free Games’ icon that appears only on reels one, two, and three.

Always one of our favourite features, Tumbling Reels is also known as Cascading Reels in other games. Whenever you get a winning combination, the involved symbols disappear and the spaces created are filled with other symbols that fall from above. If then another combination is made, the same thing happens again and this sequence continues until no more wins are formed.

This is triggered by landing three of the bonus Free Games symbols on reels one, two, and three on an active payline. You will receive one to four spins, but if your triggering symbols occur on more than one payline, you will receive more spins. During this spin, the original wild appears on reels two, three, and four, but there is also a new wild (on a red background) that appears on reels one, two, and three.

Similar Slot Machines
If you loved this artistic-themed Slot Machine, we can suggest something very similar. IGT and High5 Games have produced some slots together such as Cats and Da Vinci Diamonds. These are the alternatives we propose if you want to continue betting on slots similar to Michelangelo.
